Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: However , livers from female , and especially pregnant female rats , were strikingly resistant to the effects of tetracycline on depression of output of triglyceride under these experimental conditions .

| Disease |
| --- |
| depression |
| triglyceride |

Note: "depression" and "triglyceride" are not diseases in the classical sense, but they are being used as entities in the context of the paragraph to refer to the effects of tetracycline on the output of triglyceride in rats.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Disease |
| --- |
| depression |

The entity "triglyceride" does not clearly refer to a disease, it's a lipid molecule, so it's not included in the list of diseases.
